main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblFactLoanSecurityECResult] Script Date: 05/03/2012 10:05:27 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblFactLoanSecurityECResult]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblFactLoanSecurityECResult]
/****** Object: Table [dbo].[tblFactLoanSecurityECResult] Script Date: 05/03/2012 10:05:27 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
SET ANSI_PADDING ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblFactLoanSecurityECResult]( [DimPoolID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [DimLoanID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [DimSecurityID] [bigint] NOT NULL, [DimECID] [bigint] not null CONSTRAINT [PK_tblFactLoanSecurityECResult] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [DimPoolID] ASC, [DimLoanID] ASC, [DimSecurityID] ASC, [DimECID] )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON, FILLFACTOR = 70) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
